results.metric_name: Metadata includes descriptive core elements (creator, title, data identifier, publisher, publication date, summary and keywords) to support data findability.

FsF-F2-01M-1b.metric_test_name: Metadata is accessible through content negotiation

FsF-F2-01M-1c.metric_test_name: Metadata is accessible via typed links

FsF-F2-01M-1d.metric_test_name: Metadata is accessible via signposting links

FsF-F2-01M-2.metric_test_name: Core data citation metadata is available

creator: Jernajczyk, Wojciech
Olejarczyk, Elzbieta
summary: The dataset comprised 14 patients with paranoid schizophrenia and 14 healthy controls. Data were acquired with the sampling frequency of 250 Hz using the standard 10-20 EEG montage with 19 EEG channels: Fp1, Fp2, F7, F3, Fz, F4, F8, T3, C3, Cz, C4, T4, T5, P3, Pz, P4, T6, O1, O2. The reference electrode was placed between electrodes Fz and Cz.
core_metadata_found.title: EEG in schizophrenia
